Twenty CD45.2 bone marrow SP Sca-1+ CD45+ cells were cultured for 10 days in serum- free IMDM supplemented with 10 ng/ml SCF, 20 ng/ml TPO, 20 ng/ml IGF-2, and 10 ng/ml FGF-I (STIF medium; FIG. 2 A, bar 1), in freshly collected serum-free conditioned STIF medium from 293T cells (bar 2), or in the same conditioned medium after freeze/thaw (bar 3).
Twenty CD45.2 bone marrow SP Sca-1<sup>+</sup> CD45<sup>+</sup> cells were cultured for 5 days in STIF medium with 100 ng/ml Angptl3 (bars 1 and 4); in the same medium with 500 ng/ml IGFBP-2 (bars 2 and 5); and in the same medium with 200 ng/ml Timp-1 (bars 3 and 6) (see FIG. 4A).
